      HashMap<Constraint,Boolean> evaluateApplication(Instance app)

      evaluate the feasibility the solution against the constrained loaded in the initialization of the handler.
      <T extends CloudService>
      void      		 filterResources(List<T> resList, Tier tier)
      Filters the applicable resources against the constraints defined on the original resource
      List<ArrayList<Tier>> filterResourcesForScaleDown(List<ArrayList<Tier>> vettResTot, int hour)
      Remove resources that can not be scaled in, those are the resources with just 1 replica or with the minimum number according to the cosntraints
      Set<Tier> filterResourcesForScaleOut(Set<Tier> affectedTiers)
      Remove from the tier list the tier for which the maximum replica constraint has been reached
      List<Constraint> getConstraintByResourceId(String resourceId)
      Get the list of constraints that affect the resource with the specified id, if no constraint has been defined returns an empty list
      <clazz> List<Constraint> getConstraintByResourceId(String resourceId, Class<? extends Constraint> clazz)
      Get the list of constraints of type clazz that affect the resource with the specified id, if no constraint has been defined returns an empty list
      void loadConstraints()
      Parses the constraints from the xml file and initializes the handler

      • evaluateFeasibility

        public List<HashMap<Constraint,Boolean>> evaluateFeasibility(Solution sol)
                                                      throws ConstraintEvaluationException
        evaluate the feasibility the solution against the constrained loaded in the initialization of the handler.
        Parameters:
        sol - the solution to be evaluated
        Returns:
        a list of maps, each element in the list represent one hourly solution and the map contains all the constrained and their evaluation value
        Throws:
        ConstraintEvaluationException

      • evaluateApplication

        public HashMap<Constraint,Boolean> evaluateApplication(Instance app)
                                                throws ConstraintEvaluationException
        evaluates the feasibility of an application against the constrained loaded in the initialization of the handler.
        Parameters:
        app - the application to be evaluated
        Returns:
        a map containing all the loaded constraints and their evaluation value
        Throws:
        ConstraintEvaluationException
